sentences.en: The king now stands on the brink of a political precipice.
sentences.cn: 这位国王现在正站在政治悬崖的边缘。

sentences.en: Woods of light and tender trees all were sweeping into the east, sweeping over the horizon and a precipice.
sentences.cn: 轻盈柔嫩的树木都向东方蔓延，蔓延到过地平线和一个边缘。

sentences.en: Watching him climb up the precipice, everybody was breathless with anxiety.
sentences.cn: 看着他往悬崖上爬， 大家都捏一把汗。
